src:
Kako se izlazi iz krize? Izađeš na teren protiv šampiona i izdržiš sa igračem manje! (VIDEO)
CSKA napravio malo iznenađenje u derbiju protiv Zenita – 1:1

02 Nov 2019

Kako se izlazi iz krize? Izađeš na teren protiv šampiona i odoliš sa igračem manje! Ništa nije išlo na ruku igračima CSKA uoči današnjeg gostovanja Zenitu. Izranjavani od serije kikseva igrači Viktora Gončarenka smogli su snage da odigraju jedan od najboljih mečeva u sezoni i sa pozitivnim rezultatom napustili Sankt Peterburg – 1:1.
Kada se pogleda kako je utakmica tekla Armejci mogu da žele i za celim plenom. Vodili su dugo, ali sa igračem manje nisu mogli bolje od pozitivnog remija. Ima mnogo manjkavosti u igri CSKA ove sezone, ali jedan kvalitet je konstanta. Govorimo o izdanjima mladog hrvatskog reprezentativca Nikole Vlašića. Opet je bivši član Hajduka bio junak crvenog dela Moskve. CSKA je uveo meč u nešto sporiji ritam, a zatim je u nadoknadi prvog poluvremena Vlašić iskoristio grešku Rakickog i udarcem sa 16 metara pogodio mrežu.



Sve je bilo na strani tima koji u prethodna tri meča nije osetio slast pobede. Međutim, neoprezni Bijol je početkom nastavka dobio drugi žuti karton. Pokušao je Gončarenko uvođenjem Nababkina da prikrije igrača manje. Nije uspeo.
Zenit je krenuo još jače. Tako je u 73. minutu Dzjuba na leđima izdržao Magnusona, odlično centrirao na nogu Erohinu koji nije mogao da promaši.  




RUSIJA 1 - 15. KOLO:


Subota

Ufa - Lokomotiva 1:1 (0:0)/Bizjak 72 - Ignjatjev 90/Dinamo - Akhmat 1:1 (0:1)/Ordets 90 - Ponce 43/Soči - Tambov 1:2 (1:1)/Noboa 44 - Kostjukov 41, Melkadze 56/Zenit - CSKA 1:1 (0:1)/Erohin 73 - Vlašić 45/

Nedelja



14.30:  (2,05) Krasnodar  (3,45)  Rostov (3,60) 



Ponedeljak



12.00:  (2,50) Ural  (3,30)  Orenburg (2,85) 

14.30:  (2,10) Krila Sovjetov  (3,20)  Rubin (3,80) 

17.00:  (1,75) Spartak  (3,50)  Arsenal Tula (5,10) 


NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
How is the crisis coming out? You take the field against the champion and endure less with the player! (VIDEO)
CSKA made a small surprise in the Zenit derby - 1: 1

02 Nov 2019

How is the crisis coming out? You go out on the field against the champion and resist the player less! Nothing came to the attention of CSKA players ahead of today's visit to Zenit. Rescued from a series of cupcakes, Viktor Goncharenko's players were able to play one of the best matches of the season and leave St. Petersburg with a positive result - 1: 1.
When one looks at how the game went, the Armeans may want all the spoils. They led for a long time, but with the player they couldn't do better than a positive draw. There are many flaws in CSKA play this season, but one quality is a constant. We are talking about the editions of the young Croatian national team player Nikola Vlasic. Again, the former Hajduk member was the hero of the red part of Moscow. CSKA introduced the match at a slower pace and then in the first half's compensation Vlasic exploited Rakicki's error and hit the net with a 16-yard shot.



It was all on the side of a team that had not felt the taste of victory in the previous three matches. However, careless Bijol received a second yellow card at the start of the sequel. Goncharenko tried by introducing Nababkin to cover up the player less. He failed.
Zenith has moved even stronger. Thus, in the 73rd minute, Jubb with Magnuson on his back, centered well on Erohin's leg that he couldn't miss.




RUSSIA 1 - 15TH ROUND:


Saturday

Ufa - Lokomotiv 1: 1 (0: 0) / Bizjak 72 - Ignatyev 90 / Dynamo - Akhmat 1: 1 (0: 1) / Ordets 90 - Ponce 43 / Sochi - Tambov 1: 2 (1: 1) / Noboa 44 - Kostyukov 41, Melkadze 56 / Zenit - CSKA Moscow 1: 1 (0: 1) / Erohin 73 - Vlasic 45 /

Sunday



2.30pm: (2.05) Krasnodar (3.45) Rostov (3.60)



Monday



12.00: (2.50) Urals (3.30) Orenburg (2.85)

2.30pm: (2.10) Wings of the Soviets (3.20) Rubin (3.80)

17.00: (1,75) Spartak (3,50) Arsenal Tula (5,10)
